Module centralLibraryManagementFinal

Package centralLibraryManagement

package centralLibraryManagement
  • Class
    Description
    Account
    The Account class models a user-account and keeps track of the user's activities
    Address
    The Address class models the user's address (street, city, state, country)
    Admin
    The Admin class models the users with full permissions and unrestricted access to system functionalities
    Book
    The Book class models the books in the library
    BookManagement
    The BookManagement class is implemented to manage operation relating to books only
    Category
    The category class models the different categories of books
    CentralLibraryManagementTest
    The Test class runs the entire project from the main method.
    Color
    The Color enumerable is used to hold color constants used for styling, emphasis and beauty.
    Database
    The Database class models the system database, where information for books, transactions and users are stored.
    DBInit
    The DBInit class is a helper class for initialising the list of Books and Members when the program is first run
    Librarian
    The Librarian class models the issuing and receiving of books.
    Member
    The Member class models the users with limited permissions and restricted access to system functionalities
    MemberManagement
    The member management class is implemented to handle functionalities relating to users only
    RecordManagement
    The record management class is implemented to handle functionalities relating to transaction records
    Session
    The Session class is a generic class for handling user logins
    Status
    The Status class models the status of a user-account
    Transaction
    The Transaction class models the borrowing and return of books to and from the library
    User
    The User class models the users of the system.
